title: The Adventure Zone Primer: Where to Start
description: New to TAZ and not sure where to start? Start right here! A part of the MaxFun Block Party, Griffin, Travis, Justin, and Clint give the 101 on the different TAZ story arcs and give recommendations on which to listen to first!
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
